title: Maktoub
description: A drama about Khaled, a young man navigating love, fate, and social struggles in modern Tunisia. The series explores the intersections of wealth, power, and personal ambitions.

title: Nsibti L3ziza
description: A comedic sitcom centered around a Tunisian family dealing with their eccentric in-laws, cultural misunderstandings, and everyday life struggles, leading to hilarious situations.

title: Mnamet 3rousia
description: A lighthearted comedy series about a young bride-to-be experiencing pre-wedding struggles, as she faces family pressures, love complications, and cultural traditions.

title: Lkhotab 3albeb
description: A romantic comedy-drama revolving around matchmaking and love in Tunisian society. Young men try to win the hearts of potential brides, exploring traditions and modernity.

title: Choufli Hal
description: A cult classic Tunisian sitcom that follows the daily life of a psychiatrist and his quirky patients. The humorous situations and family moments make it one of the most beloved series.

title: Dawama
description: A thrilling drama that unravels secrets, betrayals, and power struggles in a high-class Tunisian family. It delves into love, revenge, and destiny.

title: Layem
description: A deep social drama that portrays the struggles of love and betrayal, following the complex relationships of a group of friends facing societal and personal conflicts.

title: Naouret El Hawa
description: A romantic drama that tells the story of a young couple facing family opposition and financial struggles. The series captures love, sacrifice, and resilience.

title: Awled Moufida
description: A gripping drama about a mother trying to protect her sons from the dangers of the streets, crime, and corruption, highlighting social and moral dilemmas in Tunisia.

title: El Maestro
description: A powerful drama about a music teacher who mentors troubled students in a juvenile detention center, showing the impact of art and hope in difficult circumstances.

title: Nouba
description: A musical drama set in Tunisiaâ€™s past, exploring love stories, nostalgia, and the traditional 'Nouba' music scene, bringing old and new generations together.

title: Tej El Hadhra
description: A historical drama depicting life in Tunisia during the 19th century, focusing on power struggles, forbidden love, and political intrigue within the royal court.

title: Ichk wa Dmoue
description: A passionate romance series about a love story hindered by family rivalry and social expectations, leading to heartbreak and hope.

title: Flashback
description: A dark psychological drama following a detective trying to uncover a hidden conspiracy while dealing with personal trauma and flashbacks from his past.

title: El Foundou
description: A dramatic series exploring injustice and revenge, following the life of a young man wrongly accused of a crime, who later seeks justice and redemption.
